channel.title: Dataviz on Mikhail Shilkov
channel.description: Recent content in Dataviz on Mikhail Shilkov

item.title: Visualizing (Absence Of) Cold Starts in Binaris
item.description: In my previous article, Visualizing Cold Starts, I visually demonstrated the impact of serverless cold starts on map loading time. When the serverless function serving the map tiles is cold, users experience a noticeable delay before they can see the selected map view.

item.title: Visualizing Cold Starts
item.description: I wrote a lot about cold starts of serverless functions. The articles are full of charts and numbers which are hopefully useful but might be hard to internalize. I decided to come up with a way to represent colds starts visually.
